addReward(address,uint256).details: Adds a single reward into the pool.

addRewards(address,uint256,uint256).details: Transfer an amount of a given token from the sender into the rewardPool

params.amount: The number of items to be added to the pool.

sendReward(uint256,address).details: Takes a random reward from rewardPool and sends it to someone.

params.account: Address of who will receive the reward
